articles.title: Slip of the tongue: Adhir Ranjan Chowdhury apologises to President Droupadi Murmu

articles.title: Delhi Government To Go Back To Old Policy Of Retail Liquor Sale
articles.description: With the Lieutenant Governor recommending a CBI probe into the implementation of the new excise policy, the Delhi government has decided to go back to the old regime of retail liquor sale in the city, officials said on Friday.
articles.content:
The Excise Policy 2021-22 will come to an end on July 31.
